Package shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    A rectangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
    Version:
    1.0 (15 July 2000)()
    Author:
    Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes (Modified)

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize​(int newHeight,
                       int newWidth)
        Change the size to the new size
        Parameters:
        newHeight - the new height in pixels. newHeight must be >=0.
        newWidht - the new width in pixels. newWidth must be >=0.

      • changeColor

        public void changeColor​(java.lang.String newColor)
        Change the color.
        Parameters:
        color - the new color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta" and "black".
